element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm joins adjacent lines, creating longer lines comprised of them.
Adjacency is defined by a tolerance. When two extreme points from two lines are separated by a distance less than that tolerance, they are joined, as shown in the next figure

element.name: TOLERANCE
element.text: The tolerance to define when two lines should be joined. This represent the distance between their extreme points.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting layer with joined lines.
